quote: My portfolio’s so down it qualifies for government aid.
author: Rekt Biden

quote: I told my mom I’m an investor. She told her friends I’m unemployed.

quote: They said buy the dip, but it keeps dipping like it’s salsa.

quote: I hold more bags than a luxury mall.
author: Gucci Hodler

quote: Crypto taught me patience. Still waiting for my Lambo from 2021.

quote: I check charts like it’s my toxic ex’s Instagram.
author: Chart Stalker

quote: I made 500% in one day... in my imagination.
author: DreamFi Investor

quote: My crypto plan? Buy high, cry low.
author: TearChain Founder

quote: Staying solvent is the new alpha.
author: Bear Market Buddha

quote: I told my girlfriend I was ‘diversified.’ She left with my seed phrase.
author: Ex-Fi Lover

quote: I’m not addicted to trading; I can quit after the next green candle.
author: Hopium Junkie

quote: NFTs are like relationships—cute at first, worthless later.
author: JPEG Therapist

quote: Crypto’s the only place where I can lose 90% and still be bullish.
author: Optimistic Idiot

quote: My MetaMask password is just ‘please work’.
author: Password Peasant

quote: My bags are so heavy, I count them as leg day.

quote: If you listen closely, you can hear my portfolio sobbing.
author: Sadcoin Holder

quote: Every time I buy, the market dips out of respect.
author: Bear Whisperer

quote: I don’t need therapy, I have crypto Twitter.
author: Mentally Rugged

quote: Bought Bitcoin to escape inflation. Now I miss inflation.
author: Regretonomist

quote: I told my boss I’m financially free. Now I’m unemployed and free.
author: Freedom Maximalist

quote: Crypto charts look like my heartbeat when rent’s due.
author: Flatline Trader

quote: I don’t use stop-loss. I use stop-hope.
author: Pain Management Specialist

quote: My trading bot is just me with less emotion and the same losses.

quote: I minted an NFT of my debt.

quote: The bull run left me on read.
author: Ghosted Hodler

quote: Gas fees are my most stable relationship.
author: ETH Simp

quote: WAGMI’ is just ‘Copium’ with better branding.
author: Meme Prophet

quote: My portfolio’s been in the red so long it thinks it’s Christmas.
author: Santa Satoshi

quote: Crypto isn’t gambling; it’s financial cosplay.
author: Leverage LARPer

quote: Just bought the dip. Now I live there.
author: Homeless Hodler

quote: My crypto group chat is just therapy without results.
author: Support Group Chad

quote: I invested in a coin named PEPE. My parents stopped calling.
author: FrogFi Fanatic

quote: I asked ChatGPT for a trading strategy. It told me to get a job.
author: AI Realist

quote: Crypto makes me feel alive—mainly from the adrenaline of losing.
author: Rekt Junkie

quote: The blockchain is transparent, just like my bank account.
author: SeeThroughTrader

quote: My portfolio went 100x—in losses.
author: Inverse Genius

quote: I’m not broke, I’m decentralized.
author: Web3 Homeless

quote: I didn’t buy the top; the top bought me.
author: Chart Victim

quote: My biggest position is denial.
author: Bagholder Freud

quote: Crypto bros don’t die; they just rebrand as influencers.
author: Coach Satoshi

quote: My altcoin project promised utility. It delivered community trauma.
author: Utilityless Founder

quote: Every rug pull strengthens my immune system.
author: Rekt Survivor

quote: They told me to stake. Now I’m emotionally staked.
author: Yield Zombie

quote: Crypto’s not a scam—it’s a lifestyle choice with extra steps.
author: Hopium Ambassador

quote: If I had a satoshi for every loss, I’d finally break even.
author: Mathematically Doomed

quote: The only moon I’m going to is in Animal Crossing.
author: Metaverse Tourist

quote: Crypto dating apps should match by portfolio pain level.
author: SwipeFi CEO

quote: Every influencer is a profit—just not for you.
author: Alpha Victim

quote: The pump was great. The dump was biblical.
author: Chart Disciple

quote: At least my coins can’t ghost me… they just vanish.
author: Blockchain Heartbreak

quote: I’m saving for retirement one rug pull at a time.
author: Long-Term Rekt

quote: I treat every red candle as character development.
author: Spiritual Trader

quote: Crypto’s like a rollercoaster—except it’s always going down.
author: Bear Park Enthusiast

quote: My wallet’s cold, and so is my heart.
author: FrostFi Bro

quote: I bought the dip. The dip bought my house.
author: Homeless in Web3

quote: Crypto is the art of turning money into anxiety.
author: Hopium Monk

quote: Bitcoin is freedom—mostly from financial stability.
author: Anarchy Investor

quote: My trading strategy is panic and pray.
author: FaithFi Founder

quote: The only green I see is in the meme charts.
author: MemeFi Analyst

quote: I turned my car into a mining rig. Now it mines attention.
author: Lambo Farmer

quote: Crypto cured my fear of heights—there are no highs anymore.
author: PriceFloor Philosopher

quote: I hodl because selling would make the pain real.
author: Denial Maximalist

quote: My portfolio is 100% exposure therapy.
author: PTSD Trader

quote: I’m not losing money. I’m paying tuition to the blockchain.
author: DeFi Student

quote: Every dip is just destiny saying ‘LOL’ again.
author: Karma Hodler

quote: Crypto’s decentralized, but my debt isn’t.
author: CeFi Victim

quote: My PnL stands for ‘Please, not Losses.
author: Spreadsheet Sufferer

quote: I thought I was early. Turns out I was wrong twice.
author: Premature Degen

quote: My wallet’s so empty, it echoes.
author: Rekt Whisperer

quote: Every pump reminds me I sold early.
author: Exit Liquidity Legend

quote: Crypto isn’t a scam—it’s a group project where everyone fails.
author: Blockchain Intern

quote: My hardware wallet is my emotional support device.
author: Cold Storage Carl

quote: I bought low. Then it went lower.
author: FloorFi Enthusiast

quote: My favorite coin is ‘Regret’—it’s always undervalued.
author: Emotional Investor

quote: Crypto is like Tinder: endless swiping and disappointment.
author: Swipe2Earn Bro

quote: I diversified into different ways to lose money.
author: DeFi Explorer

quote: Every chart looks bullish if you squint hard enough.
author: Hopium Analyst

quote: My risk tolerance is now a medical condition.
author: Adrenaline Chad

quote: Crypto taught me delayed gratification. Mostly the delayed part.
author: Future Bagholder

quote: The metaverse promised freedom. It gave me motion sickness.
author: VR Homeless

quote: I bought a course on trading psychology. Now I’m broke and mindful.
author: Zen Rekt

quote: I don’t check the charts anymore. They check on me.
author: Haunted Trader

quote: Crypto’s like my diet—lots of fasting, zero gains.
author: Bear Market Vegan

quote: My only stablecoin is emotional instability.
author: USDTherapist

quote: I bought the rumor and got buried by the news.
author: InfoFi Victim

quote: My wallet’s decentralized but my pain is global.
author: SadFi Nomad

quote: I joined Web3 for freedom. Now I’m free from money.
author: Satoshi Serf

quote: Crypto isn’t about wealth—it’s about trauma bonding.
author: RugPull Romantic

quote: I don’t trade anymore. I just observe chaos.
author: Bear Market Monk

quote: Crypto’s decentralized—so is my hope.
author: Hopeless Hodler

quote: I’m the liquidity everyone warned me about.
author: ExitFi Chad

quote: I used to chase pumps. Now I chase rent.
author: Rekt Tenant

quote: Crypto’s a pyramid, but at least it’s transparent.
author: Honest Schemer

quote: Every loss is a reminder I should’ve stayed in stocks.
author: TradFi Traitor

quote: My altcoin dreams became stablecoin nightmares.
author: USDT Phantom

quote: My PnL graph looks like a crime scene.
author: Forensic Trader

quote: The blockchain never forgets. Unlike my therapist.
author: MemoryFi Bro

quote: Crypto’s volatile. My sanity’s not far behind.
author: Unstable Genius

quote: Every rug teaches me a new emotion.
author: FeelFi Collector

quote: Crypto made me believe in gravity again.
author: Falling Hodler

quote: There's a difference.
author: $Exit-Ethan

quote: The whitepaper was just a 20-page document of rocket emojis. I've never felt more bullish.
author: $Bullish-Bob

quote: I put my life savings into $PooCoin. The name was literal.
author: $Literal-Larry

quote: I tried to sell, but the 'sell fee' was 100%. A 'hidden fee modifier,' they call it. Very clever.
author: $Fee-Fi-Fo-Fum

quote: I missed the $BTC bull run, but I got in on the ground floor of $AnimeSafeCoin. It rugged in 4 hours.
author: $Ground-Floor Greg

quote: The project promised a 'private metaverse.' The only thing private was the dev's new island.
author: $Meta-Mark

quote: My portfolio just got 'Ashdraked'. That's a fun word for 'total financial annihilation.
author: $Ashdraked-Ash

quote: This wasn't a rug pull. It was a 'rapid, community-led wealth redistribution.' Into one guy's wallet.
author: $Redistribution-Rob

quote: I'm part of an 'exclusive' community. So exclusive that none of us can sell.
author: $Exclusive-Ed

quote: The dev said 'trust the process.' The 'process' was him draining the liquidity pool.
author: $Process-Truster-Pete

quote: I was promised a Lambo. I got a 'rug.' At least it's a physical asset.
author: $Lambo-Liam

quote: This looks like a PnD," I thought, and then I bought it anyway.
author: $PnD-Paul

quote: I'm not 'rekt.' I'm 'contributing' to the $2.8 billion lost to rug pulls. It's a team effort.
author: $Team-Player-Tim

quote: The dev's 'Github' was just a link to his 'OnlyFans.
author: $Developer-Dan

quote: Don't get rekt," my friends said. I said, "You don't understand the tokenomics.
author: $Token-Timmy

quote: I invested in a coin called $HOPE. I am now out of $HOPE.
author: $Hope-less-Hank

quote: I saw a coin up 1000%, felt the FOMO, aped in at the all-time-high, and now I'm rekt. WAGMI?
author: $Chad NGMI

quote: My investment strategy is simple: If a YouTuber screams '100X' and the logo is a cartoon animal, I'm all in.
author: $Ape Andy

quote: NGMI? Bro, I already didn't make it.
author: $Larry Liquidated

quote: I'm a 'Degen'. That means I'm 'reckless and impulsive.' It's not a flaw, it's a lifestyle.
author: $Degen-Dan

quote: FOMO" is my gas. "REKT" is my destination.
author: $Driver-Dave

quote: I aped into a project because the name was a pun. This is how I manage my finances.
author: $Pun-Master-Phil

quote: You're NGMI because you 'rely on old-fashioned marketing'. I'm NGMI because I'm a gambling addict. We are not the same.
author: $Gambler-Gus

quote: Apeing" isn't just an investment, bro. It's a spiritual journey to $0.
author: $Spiritual-Steve

quote: I'm not a 'Degen.' I'm a 'high-beta, asymmetric-upside-seeking, risk-on' investor.
author: $Financial-Frank

quote: LFG!...to the poorhouse.
author: $LFG-Leo

quote: I'm not addicted to crypto. I'm addicted to the 'FOMO,' the 'FUD,' the 'REKT,' and the 'NGMI.
author: $Addict-Adam

quote: My portfolio is 100% 'shitcoins'. I call this 'diversification.
author: $Diversified-Don

quote: Probably nothing"... is what I told myself about the red flags.
author: $Nothing-Ned

quote: I'm not 'REKT.' I'm just 'pre-rich.' Very, very 'pre-rich.
author: $Pre-Rich-Pete

quote: WAGMI! (We're All Gonna Make It... back to our day jobs).
author: $WAGMI-Walter

quote: I'm a "Degen". My risk tolerance is 'yes.
author: $Risky-Rick

quote: I'm not NGMI. I'm just taking the scenic route to 'making it.' The route is through a dumpster fire.
author: $Scenic-Sam

quote: I'm not a 'gambler.' I'm a 'speculative trader.' The casino is just 'a decentralized exchange.
author: $DEX-Denny

quote: I'm 'apeing' into this. 'DYOR' is for 'paper hands'.
author: $Ape-Lord-Al

quote: I have 'Cryptosis'. I can't stop talking about crypto. My family is very worried.
author: $Sick-Sid

quote: I'm not a 'Moonboy'. I'm a 'Moon-Man.' I am a grown man who believes in the moon.
author: $Moon-Man-Manny

quote: I'm NGMI. My wife is NGMI. Her boyfriend is WAGMI. This is fine.
author: $Fine-Frank

quote: Ape". "HODL". "REKT". "Repeat." - This is the way.
author: $Mandalorian-Mort

quote: I'm not NGMI. I'm 'early.' So early that the project hasn't been rugged yet.
author: $Early-Evan

quote: I'm not a 'Degen.' I'm an 'auditor.' I audit new projects for 'rug-pull' vulnerabilities by investing my life savings in them.
author: $Auditor-Al

quote: Wen Lambo?" "Wen moon?" Bro, "Wen rent?
author: $Rent-Free-Randy

quote: My FOMO is stronger than my will to live.
author: $FOMO-Felix

quote: I'm not 'broke.' I'm 'crypto-rich, fiat-poor.' Very, very 'fiat-poor.
author: $Fiat-Poor-Phil

quote: I'm not 'NGMI.' I'm 'WAGMI' in a different dimension.
author: $Dimension-Dan

quote: I just 'aped' my mortgage into $CumRocket. NGMI? Hold my beer.
author: $CumRocket-Carl

quote: This is a '100X' coin," I said. It was a $0.01X coin.
author: $100X-Xavier

quote: I'm not 'down.' I'm just 'HODLing' for the 'next halving.' And the 'halving' after that.
author: $Halving-Hal

quote: I'm not 'NGMI.' I'm just 'waiting for the bull run'. From my parents' basement.
author: $Basement-Bob

quote: I'm a 'crypto enthusiast'. I'm 'enthusiastic' about 'losing money.
author: $Enthusiast-Enzo

quote: You're NGMI," they said. I said, "I know.
author: $Self-Aware-Stan

quote: Not your keys, not your coins.' I forgot my keys. It is now my coin, but also not my coin.
author: $Satoshi Not-a-moto

quote: Clicked 'Connect Wallet' on a site called 'FreeLamboNakamoto.io'. Why is my wallet empty?
author: $Martin M-ptied

quote: Be your own bank,' they said. I was my own bank. And I, the bank, just phished myself.
author: $Ashdraked Arthur

quote: I wrote my private key on a sticky note. The cat ate it. This is the future of finance.
author: $NoCoiner Neil

quote: My 'hot' wallet just got 'hot-wired.
author: $Hot-Wallet-Hank

quote: I clicked a link from an 'anon' dev offering me a 'free airdrop.' This was a mistake.
author: $Airdrop-Andy

quote: I'm not 'rekt.' I just 'donated' my entire portfolio to a 'phishing scam'.
author: $Donator-Don

quote: Lose your private key, and you might as well say goodbye to your digital gold!" I said goodbye.
author: $Goodbye-Gary

quote: The 'Connect Wallet' button is a 'Self Destruct' button, and I have a 'self-destruct' personality.
author: $Destructive-Dan

quote: My $35M portfolio was just 'phished'. I am now $35 'phished.
author: $Phished-Phil

quote: I stored my seed phrase in my email drafts. My email got hacked. I am a financial genius.
author: $Genius-Gus

quote: I'm not saying I'm bad at this, but I just 'approved' a 'smart contract' that 'stole' all my $ETH.
author: $Smart-Steve

quote: I'm my own bank. And I, the bank, am insolvent.
author: $Insolvent-Ian

quote: This is a 'honeypot'," I thought. "But maybe it's a 'sweet' honeypot.
author: $Winnie-the-Rekt

quote: I sent $50,000 of $ETH to the wrong address. The 'blockchain' is 'immutable.' My 'stupidity' is also 'immutable.
author: $Immutable-Idiot

quote: I have a 'hardware wallet.' It's currently in a 'landfill.
author: $Landfill-Larry

quote: My 'private key' is '123456789'. How did I get 'hacked'?
author: $Secure-Sam

quote: The 'freedom' of DeFi is the 'freedom' to lose your life savings in 0.S.S. seconds.
author: $Free-Fred

quote: I 'social engineered' myself into giving up my 'seed phrase.
author: $Social-Simon

quote: I'm not 'poor.' I'm just 'waiting for my 'hacked' funds to be 'returned' by the 'hacker.
author: $Hacker-Helper-Hank

quote: My 'wallet' is now a 'watch-only' wallet. I 'watch' my 'stolen' funds.
author: $Watcher-Will

quote: I'm not 'stupid.' I'm 'trust-minimized.' I 'minimized' my 'trust' so much I 'trusted' a 'scammer.
author: $Trust-less-Tim

quote: I just 'lost' $200 million because I 'lost' a 'password'. I am 'Stefan Thomas.
author: $Stefan-The-S-d

quote: I 'signed' a transaction I 'didn't read.' It was a 'bad' transaction.
author: $Reader-Rick

quote: Be your own bank." My 'bank' is a 'dumpster fire.
author: $Bank-Fire-Bob

quote: My $4B 'Ponzi scheme' collapsed. I am 'OneCoin.
author: $OneCoin-Con

quote: I'm not 'broke.' I'm just 'crypto-pilled' and 'wallet-drained.
author: $Pilled-Paul

quote: My 'wallet' is 'connected'. My 'brain' is 'disconnected.
author: $Disconnected-Don

quote: I'm not 'hacked.' I'm 'experiencing' a 'spontaneous, unauthorized' 'wealth 'transfer.
author: $Spontaneous-Sam

quote: I 'lost' my 'Bitcoin' in a 'boating accident.' The 'boat' was my 'hard drive.' The 'accident' was me 'formatting' it.
author: $Boating-Bob

quote: I'm not 'rekt.' I'm 'learning' about 'operational security.' The 'hard' way.
author: $OpSec-Owen

quote: Don't trust, verify." I 'trusted.' I 'didn't verify.' I'm 'rekt.
author: $Verified-Vince

quote: My 'password' was 'password123.' I am a 'victim.
author: $Victim-Vince

quote: I'm not 'NGMI.' I'm just 'NGMI... with this wallet.' Or the 'next' one.
author: $NGMI-Nick

quote: Connect Wallet'? No thanks. I've 'disconnected' my 'life support.
author: $Disconnected-Dave

quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war. Defeated warriors ape in at the ATH and then shill their bags on Twitter.
author: $General Zod-led

quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity... to get liquidated.
author: $Tzu TheRekt

quote: If you know yourself but not the enemy, for every victory you will also suffer a rug pull. If you know neither yourself nor the enemy, you are a crypto bro.
author: $Sun TheBankrupt

quote: Appear weak when you are strong. Appear strong when your entire net worth is in Dogecoin.
author: $Colonel Copium

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting. The supreme art of crypto is to get rekt by an anon dev you've never met.
author: $Warlord-Willy

quote: He will win who knows when to ape and when not to ape. (He is not here.)
author: $Ape-less-Al

quote: All warfare is based on deception. All crypto is based on shilling.
author: $Deceptive-Dan

quote: If your opponent is of choleric temper, irritate him. If your opponent is a degen, shill him a shitcoin.
author: $Irritated-Ian

quote: Pretend to be weak, that he may grow arrogant. Pretend to be a financial expert, that he may ape into your $PooCoin.
author: $Arrogant-Art

quote: The opportunity of liquidating the enemy is provided by the enemy himself setting his leverage too high.
author: $Leverage-Larry

quote: Move not unless you see an advantage. Ape not unless you see a '100X' tweet.
author: $Advantage-Andy

quote: To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To HODL one coin for ten years and sell at a $1 loss is.
author: $Acme-Al

quote: What enables the wise sovereign to conquer is foreknowledge. What enables the degen to get rekt is FOMO.
author: $Foreknowledge-Fred

quote: If you know neither the enemy nor yourself, you will succumb in every trade.
author: $Succumb-Steve

quote: There is no instance of a nation benefiting from prolonged warfare. There is no instance of a degen benefiting from 'diamond hands' on a dead coin.
author: $Prolonged-Paul

quote: The soldier works out his victory in relation to the foe. The degen works out his margin call in relation to the 'All-Time-High.
author: $Foe-Fighter-Fred

quote: If the enemy leaves a door open, you must rush in. If the Discord is open, you must ape in.
author: $Rush-In-Ron

quote: Regard your soldiers as your children. Regard your $JPGs as your financial future.
author: $Future-Frank

quote: The general who advances without coveting fame is a jewel. The degen who apes without 'DYOR' is a 'bagholder.
author: $Jewel-less-Jim

quote: To fight and conquer is not supreme excellence. Supreme excellence consists in rugging the enemy without fighting.
author: $Supreme-Scott

quote: Water shapes its course according to the ground. The degen shapes his portfolio according to the shills.
author: $Shill-Follower-Shaun

quote: He who can modify his tactics... may be called a heaven-born captain. He who cannot... is 'rekt.
author: $Rekt-Roy

quote: Know thy self, know thy enemy. Know thy 'shitcoin,' know thy 'scammer.
author: $Know-Nothing-Ned

quote: Be extremely subtle, even to the point of formlessness. Be extremely 'degen,' even to the point of 'bankruptcy.
author: $Formless-Frank

quote: If you are strong, appear weak. If you are 'rekt,' appear 'HODLing.
author: $HODL-Hank

quote: Attack him where he is unprepared. 'Ape' where you are 'uninformed.
author: $Uninformed-Uri

quote: The art of war is of vital importance. The 'art' of 'NFTs' is of 'questionable' importance.
author: $Art-Critic-Art

quote: If his forces are united, separate them. If his 'coins' are 'united,' 'rug' them.
author: $Separate-Sam

quote: Quickness is the essence of the war. 'Apeing' is the essence of the 'rug pull.
author: $Quick-Quinn

quote: Victorious warriors win first. Defeated warriors tweet 'NGMI' first.
author: $NGMI-Nick

quote: The most successful people I've met: 1. Shilled constantly. 2. Were anon daily. 3. Had laser eyes. 4. Believed in their own bags. 5. Got rekt anyway.
author: $Pomp TheBankrupt

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to 'Buy The Dip' one more time that counts.
author: $Winston Churkt

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways to get rugged.
author: $Thomas Rekt-ison

quote: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether your liquidation price gets hit.
author: $Vince Lom-rekt-i

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value... as exit liquidity.
author: $Albert Exit-stein

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we get rugged.
author: $Confucius TheConfused

quote: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not 'aping' into a coin with a $DOGE in the logo.
author: $Michael-Jordan-The-Degen

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time with a $0 balance.
author: $Henry Fraud

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the 'dips' you didn't 'buy.
author: $Mark-Twain-The-Trader

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same... 'decentralized' 'shitcoin' 'exchange.
author: $Colin-Davis-The-Degen

quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to '100x' your 'life savings' on a 'memecoin.
author: $Theodore-Roose-rekt

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to get 'liquidated.
author: $Walt-Dis-rekt

quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to 'ape' into a coin with 'Safe' in the name.
author: $Safe-Steve

quote: Develop success from failures. Develop 'bags' from 'dips.
author: $Dale-Car-rekt-gie

quote: It always seems impossible until it's 'rugged.
author: $Nelson-Man-rekt

quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes... by 'shilling' them to 'newbies.
author: $Shill-Man-Shelby

quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I'm 'rekt.
author: $Michael-J-Rekt

quote: Failure is another stepping stone to greatness. Failure is another 'shitcoin' in my 'portfolio.
author: $Oprah-W-rekt

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation... of 'Warren Buffett.
author: $Herman-Mel-rekt

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing. I am 'risk.
author: $Warren-Buff-it

quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly... 'negative' 'returns.
author: $JFK-Rekt

quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of... 'getting rugged.
author: $Bill-Gates-The-Bagholder

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop... 'buying the dip.
author: $Confucius-The-Buyer

quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by 'aping' and 'falling over.
author: $Richard-Br-rekt

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any... 'leverage.
author: $Alice-Walker-The-Trader

quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing. I've 'made' 'many' 'mistakes' and 'learned' 'nothing.
author: $Henry-Ford-The-Fool

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to... 'getting liquidated.
author: $Thomas-Edison-The-Liquid

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the 'shitcoins' others have 'dumped' on him.
author: $David-Brink-rekt

quote: Work hard in silence, let your 'liquidation' be your noise.
author: $Frank-Ocean-The-Rekt

quote: You must be the 'change' you wish to see in the 'blockchain.
author: $Gandhi-The-Gas-Fee

quote: I am no longer accepting the things I cannot change. I am 'accepting' my '$0' 'balance.
author: $Angela-Davis-The-Drained

quote: The most successful people I know: 1. Honk. 2. Honk. 3. Honk. 4. Honk. 5. Honk. 6. Honk. 7. Are geese.
author: $Honk-Honk-Harry

quote: The most successful people I know hate themselves and smoke weed constantly.
author: $Bess-Kalb-The-Realist

quote: The most successful people I've met: 1. Take good naps. 2. Eat regular meals. 3. Are golden retrievers.
author: $TechnicallyRon-The-Good-Boy

quote: The heights by great men reached and kept... were attained by 'insider trading.
author: $Longfellow-The-Insider

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having a.jpg of a monkey you're pretty sure you still own the private key to.
author: $Epictetus TheEvicted

quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart. And definitely not on a centralized exchange.

quote: The only real security a man has in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and a hardware wallet he buried in the desert.

quote: Moderation in all things... except 'leverage.
